content.detailedDescription:
I was outside smoking a cigarette in my back yard, i thought it would be cool to see a ufo,then for some reason decided to look to my left and saw the object coming from mountain area. it climbed and hover on top my house for a long period of time, i decided to go upstairs and tell my wife, she saw it from the balcony. at this time it was really high but it was at times very bright, we could see it really easy, after that i decided to get my camera and take some pictures from the balcony wich i have. at this time i didnt realize it because i was using the lens of the camera but it started to decent slowly. i took video of it and when i took video it was decending into the city, i lost it when it decended behind some trees.
maybe it was a smart weather ballon if such things exist!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw it coming from lax area, climbed, hover and then it decended to city.

content.detailedDescription:
I work as a pipeline control center operator and received a call at 7:30 pm local time about damage to a substantial roof structure covering one of the pumping stations i monitor. we dispatched a field operator to the site that night who reported that it looked like the entire structure( 100' l x 30' w ) was literally pulled out of the ground by something. this roof structure weighs an estimated 50,000 lbs! damage to other items nearby was minimal or non-existant. there was no known weather event that took place that afternoon such as a tornado or microburst. 

a few days later i read about animal mutilations ( horse and goats ) in the newspaper that occured that same afternoon within a few miles away.
content.summary: Damage to a large roof structure and a horse mutilation.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night about 10:00pm or 11:00pm 6-25-2009
i for some reason started to awaken a bit and
i senced that someone was in my bedroom and that
they was at the foot of my bed so i lifted my
two feet and pushed againsted something or
someone and i blacked out. and i dont remember any thing
after that. well i guess it has started for the summer
content.summary: Encounter

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my patio with my wife and her sister. when i first noticed a large bullet shaped object flying from the sw about 1 mile up.I then told my wife and her sister to look up and see it. the object then continued to fly over to where we were and over the house. we heard no sound.The object did not have any wings,and any windows that were visable or lights.It was not a blimp or any other aircraft i have ever seen.It continued flying in a straight path toward the ne until out of our sight which lasted about 1 minute.
content.summary: Large silver bullet shaped craft flying sw to ne low across sky

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, so five of us were in a van bringing a friend home on the raymond rd. in brunswick me.  i can't remember the exact date as this was 12 yrs ago. all i know is that it was late spring in 1997, approx. 6 pm in the evening est.  we came around a corner and we stopped for a second.  don't know why we stopped, we just did.  all of a sudden from behind some trees, a black triangular craft floated out from behind some trees.  the trees were only about 50-70 ft. tall and possibly as little as 50 yards away!! it was close, real close.  it kind of like hovered there for a second.  when it started moving it was kind of like just floating along real slow and completely silent. we just sat there and watched it. i remember when it appeared i hollered out, "oh my god! a ufo!" cause i'm a firm believer in them.  we just watched it. then i think that what ever was driving it noticed us cause it started to float away and when it did it actually hit the top of a tree causing the tree to move!  it was floating.  thats the only way to describe its flight.  it was moving side to side like a fighter jet would do to avoid getting a missle lock on it.  kind of like side to side.  while it was doing this, we were able to see the bottom, side and top.  it was completely black, and had no windows.  from the side, there was a "cockpit" type bubble similar to that of a b-2 stealth bomber, but not as severe if that makes any sense.  the color was a flat black color, no reflection from the sun.  from the bottom, it had solid white lights at each tip of the triangle, and in the very center it had a single blinking red light. no markings what so ever.  it was kind of surreal. i remember it like it was yesterday.  i thought it was totally awesome, awe inspiring.  the four friends with me didn't seem to impressed, i don't think they understood how special this event actually was to witness. i actually jumped out of the van to watch it. it was just floating around for about 5-8 mins before it just floated away til we lost sight of it. the entire event was probably around 10 minutes.  i totally wish i had had a camera or cam-corder cause this could of been one of the best ufo sightings ever if i could of got it on film. i will try to attach a sketch of it. when this event occured, i had never heard of a triangle ufo before.  a few years ago i went on the internet to research this.  what i found blew me away.  the infamous "belgium wave" pics are identical to the craft that i saw. except that i saw mine during the daylight hours, and i saw it from all possible angles due to its flight pattern.  but again, the infamous "belgium" pics are identical to what i observed when seeing the bottom of this craft. i will admit that when i saw this and to this day, i have to say that if this craft is not extra terrestrial, it is definately a "secret" military aircraft. especially since the brunswick naval air station is less than five miles away from the site. it looked like the same material as the b-2 and f-117 stealth planes, but it was not a stealth plane, it was a triangle.  i recently saw footage of a f-117 taking off at night, and the lights on the bottom of the jet looked like and reminded me of the triangle's lights.  three solid whites and a rotating or blinking red light, but in a different configuration as the f-117 is not a triangle. 

and yes, like i said before, it did hit a tree, i probably could not find the exact tree today, however i do know the general area it was in, however some new houses have gone in the area since then. 

well, thats about it on this case. iam going to be reporting another sighting from a few weeks ago, i just have to find the date, as i do have the date and time for this other sighting. 

thank you and i wish i would of reported it sooner.  if you have any further questions, feel free to e-mail me at the address given. 

your further questionaire made me remember that after the sighting, when it was finally dark out; there were alot of planes that i could see in the sky at high altitudes.  there's usually quite a bit of air traffic anyway as the navy air base is in town and portland int. jetport is only about 20-25 miles away, but i had never seen this many planes at one time either before or after this event.  this happened the same day, probably a couple hrs later after it got dark. i found it quite strange like they were looking for the craft or something.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Saw a black triangle in the daylight hours, approx. 12 yrs ago. don't know why i didn't report then as it was an incredible sighting, i was only a teen; i remember it fully to this day.

content.detailedDescription:
Here is the link to the video so you can check it for yourself....
http://www.Bbc.Co.Uk/iplayer/episode/b00lc4cm/bbc_news_at_one_26_06_2009/
watch the right side of the screen 27mins - 27mins 10 secs into the video.
i got home from work at 12:30pm and was watching the news. they were talking at wimbledon for the tennis and suddenly there was a weird light that seemed to pass inbetween low cloud. 
i went stright onto the internet and found the video clip again and upon closer examination it seems like it is 2 orbs following each other although i may be wrong.
please watch this video and let me know what you think
psyjon69@yahoo.Co.Uk
content.summary: Ufo on bbc news!!!

content.detailedDescription:
Each night i get home 1st t thing i do is go to the bathroom.  my toilet is right by the window facing south.  i am in a hi rise building facing south the view is a familiar one.  tonite as i went to the bathroom i stared out the window as usual and there was this light.  it appeared to be a star but it was a cloudy night.  i was the only star in the sky.  it wasnt moving just seemed to be there.  a star. except it seemed to be blinking.  each second it went back and forth from bright white to dim white.  i caught myself staring at it wondering if it was a star.  my brother and 2 friends came to my home about an hour in.  i had all of them take a look at it.  passenger planes would fly by, we would compare the light, even when dim, the stars light seemed brighter then the plane.  like a pure white light,  i checked on it for about another hour it hadnt moved.  15 minutes later i checked again, it was gone.

it seemed to high to be a helicopter.  it also to my opinion stay way too long in that same spot.  im not sure helicoptors can hover but 2 hours plus seems to be alot.  my friends and i have no idea what we were looking at.  it was high up  but under clouds.  which made it really stand out.  from the yankee staduim area in the bronx, it was high in the southwest sky.  we dont know what this was.
content.summary: It was a star like light flashing dim white then bright white.

content.detailedDescription:
I copied a guys header from his event on june 22...It is exactly what i saw the next night on june 23rd. i was outside and drinking a glass of wine laying back in my patio chair and i saw a star like object moving very fast at a high altitude. it was 10:50 pm  , i went in to get my binoculars and by the time i walked into the hallway and came back it was gone. i mean this thing was hauling ass. 

i went out tonight at the same time to see if i could see maybe the same thing at the same time, but nothing. i figure if it were a plane or satelite or space station i would see it orbit at the same time, generally. but nothing. and usually by that time of night  the air traffic around my place in frisco texas is very light, and believe me this was no plane. it was very faint,  looked like it was 40,000 ft plus easy...About the light value of the dimmest star you could see. thats actually what caught my attention initially. the dimmness and then, the speed. when a plane is at that altitude or higher it takes it awhile to traverse the vision path i have of the sky, and this thing had no problem going from north to southeast at 1/3 of the time a jet would have. i was blown away. i am a 45 year old professional male, i was totally sober and served 6 years in the air force, stationed at bentwaters raf and tinker afb. i know aircrafet and reasonable speed. this was pretty strange. if anyone had the same experience or if you know what i saw, please contact me, powelson.Stephen@gmail...Thanks!
content.summary: Traveling from the northwest towards the southeast at an extreme altitude, bright star-like, extreme speed.

content.detailedDescription:
about 11pm, on the northside of columbus, indiana, on thursday, june 25, 2009, i was locking up my car, i closed the door and started walking toward the front of my house and noticed a rather large glowing object floating in the sky from south to the north. the object seemed to be approximately 1/2 mile away or closer. it was sort of coned shaped, bigger at the top than the bottom. it had a reddish brown glow to it. i listened and could not hear anything and it was extremely quiet outside as i don't live close to the noise and traffic of the city. i wasn't afraid of it, just very curious because i have never seen anything like this in my lifetime. 
   i quickly ran to the door and yelled for my wife to come look at this, as i wanted to make sure i wasn't imagining it. she came out and saw exactly what i saw. we watched it as it floated to the north and the glowing light became dimmer and dimmer and then just seemed to fade away into the darkness. this whole occurence or sighting lasted maybe 60 seconds. she didn't hear anything either, just quiet.
   my wife and i watched for another 30 minutes, hoping it might come back but of course, it didn't.
   i've watched ufo documentaries before and i'm very intrigued but i never thought i might actually see one. i'm not positive that i did but i can't explain what i saw.
content.summary: Possible ufo sighting in columbus, in june 09.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down hwy 125 between bledsoe and leman tx headed west when a bright light caught my eye north of bledsoe.. it stayed on for about 2 seconds before blinking out.. 5 seconds later the light came back on more intense this time the light had a very noticable red ring around the out side edge of the brilliant white center.. after 10 seconds the light dimmed to a pale blue point of light similar to a star.. 15 seconds later the light disappeared... there was not motion at all.. it was too low in the sky to be a star.. but too high up to be a radio tower.. i watched the exact spot as well as the surronding sky for 45 mins to see if the object would return with no luck..The light appeared to be approximately 5 miles from my position which was 1 mile east of bledsoe..
content.summary: Bright white light with a red ring around it.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been watching this object for over 6 months, it appears almost directly overhead stays motion less for up to 2 minutes then makes odd patterns in sky, zips around it's orginal location and then stops dead before movement starts it flickers but does not appear now to be moving towards earth but is in between jupiter and mars. it is a bright white light much like a star but the movements are being made by something.
i have tried every photographic method at my disposable but the light is so faint that nothing can pick it up yet it is clearly visable with the naked eye.Nasa, air force both say they don't see it but that's impossible because myself + neighbors have parties watching it do it's thing. this is an u f o without question
content.summary: Stays in 1 spot then moves 10 degrees off center.

content.detailedDescription:
Last friday (19 june 2009) night my friend, who was visiting, and i were sitting outside on my patio smoking a cigarette and talking. i estimate the time of the event to be around 22:30, though i may have been mistaken since we had just been hanging out all night and not paying attention to time. my friend and i were outside smoking, and she looked up in the sky and pointed out to me what we both thought was a satellite. it was moving south-southeast we watched it briefly (about five seconds), only to see it stop mid-flight, jerk to the northeast (diagonally up and left from its position), and begin flight again. the object continued this pattern of stopping and re-starting for the next thirty to forty seconds. its timing was very sporadic as was the degree to which it adjusted its flight path. when we started losing sight of it, i climbed up on top of my chair, but could not see it anymore due to the light pollution on the horizon. i walked inside and told my boyfriend, who was sitting on the sofa watching tv, exactly what we saw. my friend confirmed everything. my boyfriend told us that he had seen objects like that in the sky over the beach before.
neither my friend nor myself could discern a specific shape or color to the object as it was very high in the atmosphere. the area in which the sighting occurred is close to the canaveral national seashore, so there is a possibility that it was some sort of government intelligence. 
my friend and i are both twenty years old. she and i were room mates at the university of alabama for one semester, after which i moved to the eastern florida coast and she moved to a suburb outside of new york city. we're both hard-working students. my friend is pursuing a degree in nursing, while i'm busy studying chemistry so that i can do research someday. i'm also a waitress in a local wine bar. my friend had been working at a red lobster part-time. my boyfriend has a bachelors degree in economics from the university of florida, but due to the economy he works at a local restaurant on the beach. until february of this year, he worked overnight (from the time the restaurant closed until about 5:00) doing security and some maintenance.
content.summary: Unknown object flies over beachside new smyrna.

content.detailedDescription:
The witness stated that on october 31st, 2008 last year on halloween he was intentionally looking for anomallies or ufos in the night sky. this occurred in mendon, ny. it was a cloudy night and he was about to leave when he saw a star moving in the sky which caught his attention. it was moving faster than normal stars, and coming straight at him. it was very far away but it looked like a star, but what caught his attention was that he could hear it. it was very 'loud' and then it turned direction upward then blinked out/disappeared.
he theorized it to be a military space operation or one of rochester's air crafts, since there is an air base very close by. but he estimated the direction of the star to be traveling from buffalo or canada. 
the noise was very loud, like a 'jet engine' or a plane taking off. it sounded as if it were 20 times closer than it really was, and the low rumble continued.

Per witness, in 1994 he and several friends and family members witnessed a sighting over their back yard. it was april or may of that year and they were having a cook out in the back yard with their neighbors, and their two daughters. this occurred in mendon, ny. the witness was approximately 10 years old at the time. it was later in the evening and started to get dark, when they heard what he described as a celestial noise before they saw anything. and slowly they saw a craft appear over the roof of the house, off of an angle. he stated it looked about 300 feet in length, and it hovered, turned on an axis, then flew off towards the farm lands in the opposite direction. it took off at the speed of light, as described per the witness and was the shape of a baseball diamond, light on each side. everyone there saw it and were pointing and screaming that they saw a ufo. the two sets of parents separated all the children into separate rooms and asked them each to draw what they saw. each child produced a drawing that pictured the same object. the witness did say his parents held onto the drawings for many years but that he did not think his parents still had them.
content.summary: Diamond shape object over house.

content.detailedDescription: On my way to work this morning at 3:53 am i was driving east bound on i-10. i looked toward the sky and saw what apeared to be a falling star. one problem was the falling star was falling sideways or flat not down like a typical falling star. i continued to watch and as it came closer to the earth. then i noticed it was not a falling star but seamed to be on fire. after falling for a second or two it stoped falling and took off at an incredible rate of speed. the pattern was like a check mark in the sky. the direction of the craft was north to south. now i have seen airplanes or jets and this was definatly not afterburner. after thinking about this the past few days i feel that the craft was crash landing and then regained control. again this was no aircraft the human body could not with stand the speed and force this craft was producing.
content.summary: Falling star.

content.detailedDescription: As we where driving on the road to ladybrand and we were looking at the mountains with snow i noticed a bright shining starlike object very very bright the sun was reflecting of its body it seamed to be moving but sooo slow like it was soaking up the sun then it seemed to stop and jus hover we first thought it (a plane) but no plane could hover or travel so slow just f#@&*67 amazing it seemed to become bigger as we traveled around it longer. i still don't know what we saw .....Strange then we traveled further untill it was gone behind the mountain we did not stop we could not say if it shot away or anything... damn
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Cigar,  Cylinder,  Oval,  Sphere
content.summary: Super silver shining ovaly cigar shaped  ufo hovering just below clouds no movenent approx 10km far from us the size of a old zeppelin huge.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving back from work at night my friends noticed a white light moving across the sky at an accelerated pace.  the object slowly started getting closer and we noticed that there were very dull strobes flickering underneath.  it was quite soon that we realised that it was definitely not an airplane or helicopter as its flight pattern was quite un-natural.  we speculated that it was maybe the us engineered predator spy plane.  soon it flew slowly above our car while we were driving at approximately 80km/h.  i stared at what appeared to be a black triangle for about 20 seconds.  it had 3 dull lights underneath, one for each corner.  the lighting sequence went in a clockwise fashion at one second intervals.  we were all filled with absolute terror when we saw that it was in fact a triangle with lights flashing in a sequence.  the sequence was unlike anything a conventional man made aircraft would have.  the impression that we got was that this was in fact some kind of spacecraft.  it started to fly away from the car.  at this point we noticed that it also featured a red (static) light.  it then appeared to turn back around and followed our car as we manoeuvred through long sweeping freeway bends.  it then flew away to the right of our car where we continued to watch it for several minutes.  at this point we noticed that it also featured a green static light at the rear.  my friends and i were in shock and kept saying 'it's a bloody spaceship!'.  after a few minutes the object flew behind the clouds and disappeared.

as i viewed the triangle for those 20 seconds i constantly tried to see if it was in fact a plane or helicopter.  my 2 friends and i are 100% sure that this object was a black triangle.  the light sequence on the bottom of the triangle gave us a very strange feeling that was we were seeing was not of human origin.  one of my friends in the car claimed to have seen the exact same triangle about a year ago at the same time with someone else.  object was silent
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watched a black triangle fly above the car for up to 20 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
At stated date/time, i was standing on my balcony which faces north, directly under the lax final approach. at my location, lax sits at about 8-10 miles west. i often look at the passing aircraft and as i did, i saw an uta (unknown type aircraft)/ufo doing counter clockwise orbits roughly @ 20-30,000 feet over arcadia/pasadena/sierra madre region of l.A. county (north northeast of downey, ca). the initiation of the orbit began with an inbound approach from the west, at roughly 2005 hrs pdt. 

what caught my attention to this was the brightness of the craft and the relative speed for the altitude, which was fast and at that altitude, the craft had to be clear of any issues with lax approach. i eyeballed the craft until it was about 8-10 miles out. the craft then entered into a sharp left bank, leveled out, then another sharp left bank at what appeared to be about 5 miles into its first leg. 

an attempt to capture the event on video proved fruitless. on review, the image was black (too distant). the uta/ufo was very brightly lit and it appeared to have a strobe on the port side, indicating to me that it was an aircraft rather than ufo per se. 


update 2300 pdt: i just went out to see if the object was still doing orbits. it is and further, i heard a very faint roar. i believe this is possibly military, maybe a cap (combat air patrol) over metro la. 

as the object turned nnw/w, i lost sight of it, then regained it as it came back sse/e to resume its orbits. the object is still on station at this time, 2304 pdt.
content.summary: Unknown type aircraft orbiting.

content.detailedDescription:
I live way up in the mountains and was letting dog out.  noticed an extremely bright yellow/orange light just over the mountains to the east, significantly brighter than any star or airplane, but completely silent and almost motionless.  object moved straight up into the sky, very slowly and still silently, then a bit faster and then just winked out of sight.  

next, two smaller lights did the same thing -- but these had flashing red lights and an audible, but still very quiet, engine noise (military jets?) following the trajectory of the first object.  

finally, another solid light, even brighter, but white not yellow/orange, in the same relative location (east) but below the treeline, meaning hovering very, very near the ground. this light blinked twice and then also vanished.

tried to photograph, but not enough light to catch detail.
content.summary: Bright objects on & below horizon line -- hovered then vanished w/o sound.

content.detailedDescription:
after coming home from work it is my habith of going out in my small terrace
during evening altought in the city it was bright watching the billboard signs admiring the buildings lights. then suddenly there come a blackout which started about 7pm our local manila time. for me that was great for i can see the stars more clearly. but as i was admiring the southern sky, i saw this six cubelike objects travelling slowly ( my estimate is they may be 
 high and they may be huge} towards the north above the manila bay. i know what an aircraft might look like at night at this height. but its different,
i tried to take a photo of the objects with my vga cam phone but no images came out. the light the object emitted are rather pale.I only lose sight of the object when the power returns and the sky was again obscured
content.summary: Blue colored cube shaped, 6 in formation.

content.detailedDescription:
Photo listed is not the same as described by witness below. it was a second sighting at the same general location on the same date.

the time was 11:am the place louisville international airport.
i work for a very large package handling company, i am sure you have seen our vans. i work the air district side, on the ramp. i arrived to work to day 10:30 ish, as i was arriving to the bird i was to be working with today, some guy's came across the radio and started asking everyone if they were seeing this ufo over the north south runway. curiosity sent me to the edge of the ramp and take a look, i didn't see anything so i thought some board people were just joking, i went on about my work.
at about 1:55pm i was on the k-loader for the bird, and i happened to see a reflection in the sky. the reflection was as if someone had a mirror and was trying to signal you. it would flash then be dark and then the sun would catch it and flash again, it was about midway over the runway at this point. i was working at the south end of the runway. as this object came closer i could make out it was rotating and was a cylinder then was a diamond shape. as it spun horizontally and clockwise the cylinder shape would catch the sun and reflect, but the diamond shape was black. the speed of the rotation was about 4 times a minute. it continued in a straight line over the runway at a slow and steady speed, it's height was just under the clouds, the puffy white clouds, that were scattered and sparse. approximate altitude around 1500 feet asl. it continued until it reached the very end of our ramp. it then sat in this position for 30 to 45 seconds, then started to ascend above the clouds. at that point i lost visual and it disappeared.
the air traffic was very lite today, and at the time of my sighting there were no airlines landing or taking off from this runway. the object was moving against the wind that i would say was 5 to 8 miles an hour breeze, with lite gusts.
i was wearing hearing protection and didn't think to take them out to try and hear anything. so i can't comment on the sound or non-sound it may have made. but there were no sounds that i am not used to hearing at the airport, and when the airport was quiet, as it was during my sighting.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Slow moving small object rotating, the sun would flash of its surface as it spun.

content.detailedDescription:
The ufo was a square shape with rounded edges (not rotating), glowing a bright orange. in the sky it appeared approx the size of alight aircraft descending to land at southampton airport, however was apparently at much higher altitude and travelling at much higher speed. my initial thoughts were that i was seeing the burn-out of a satellite on re-entry, however this object was either very large at high altitude, or very fast at a lower altitude. the expected burn-out did not occur; instead the object continued to arc across the sky for approx 15-20 secs over an arc of approx 90 degrees until i lost sight as it passed behind a nearby tree. the direction of travel was north to south(west) at approx 190-200 degrees (based on pole star north).

my first thought upon seeing the object was that i was witnessing a very large meteorite entry - it was very large in the sky. however as i continued to observe, it bacame clear that the velocity, though much faster than any aircraft, or low-orbit satellite, was way below that of a normal meteorite. furthermore, it had a distinctive square shape and seemed to maintain its attitude as it traversed the sky, apparently wavering as an aeroplane would as it sought to align itself with a runway on approach. its velocity did not appear to be perfectly constant and, while appearing to travel extremely fast, it did not exhibit the 'streaking' effect of an object entering the atmosphere at high velocity.

i have no particular interest or fascination with ufos and as a qualified engineer, tend to seek a rational and scientific explanation to mysterious events. however, having witnessed such an extraordinary occurence, i thought it was important to place it on record in a timely fashion and in as much detail as possible. it has of course occcurred to me that this may be some figment of imagination or optical abhorration and i would therefore appreciate news of any corrobarative sightings you may be aware of.
content.summary: Bright orange square shaped high-velocity object.

content.detailedDescription: Estabamos celebrando la berbena de sanjuan... cuando cerca de las 4 de la maana en el cielo paso una esfera de luz azul, que paso rapidamente en el cielo. no puedo deberse a fuegos artificiales porque la esfera de luz paso de un lado al otro del cielo... por lo tanto no puedo tratarse de algun fuego artificial, ya que aquella noche se utilizaban muchos.
content.summary: Ovni a gran velocidad.

content.detailedDescription: While installing a security camera on a telephone poll, i was standing on top of a panel-truck while my partner was on a ladder. i was looking up at him. i was on the westside of the poll looking up at him when, in a vary clear sky, was what looked like a bright star coming from the northwest. it seemed to be at a vary high altatude and moving vary fast. it was heading southeast almost directly over head. from the time i first seen the object until it disappeared to the southeast was about 10 seconds. i told my partner to look but when he looked up a buzzard was flying by also and that caught his attention first and he missed the sighting. what stood out was the speed in which it was traveling. i am a amature astronomer and i know aircraft vary well, living near wright patterson afb my whole life. this was no meteor or aircraft that i know of. i have observed the space-station and the shuttle fly over and this was neither.
content.summary: Traveling from the northwest towards the southeast at an extreme altitude, bright star-like, extreme speed.

content.detailedDescription:
This is a report that i took from a person living in the kansas city area who called in this report after seeing a tv interview i did.  she wishes to remain anonymous due to her job.  she gave me this report over the phone the day after it occurred.  the woman was somewhat upset about this and i felt that she was genuine.  she wants no publicity.  i am going to take another investigator with me in the near future to spend some time watching the area from her house and will add to this report later. 

"i went outside on my back deck at 2:00 am to have a smoke and let the dog out. behind our subdivision there are woods going back for miles - this is a public park or national forest land.  i noticed a large white light in the southwest and as it moved slowly closer in my direction it got larger and larger.  it stopped and i grabbed my high-powered binoculars to look at it - and i could see three large spheres connected together with a large arm or protrusion exending out at an angle underneath the craft.  the arm was moving around in a circle.  it was metal looking, but i couldn't tell what material it was made of. the object emitted a very bright white light.  it stayed in that position for a long time then just dissapeared.  right afterwards, many military looking planes and helicopters appeared and combed the area for an hour. i am familiar with the planes coming to and from the johnson county airport, and these were not commercial planes.  

also notable is that there has been a decrease in air traffic from the jo co airport in the past three months.  

i have lived in this house for four years and have seen many strange objects in the sky, including a black triangle shaped craft that floated by very slowly one evening last winter at 11:00 pm right over the center of our street.  it was very close and very large.  the lights on the bottom of the craft were so bright they illuminated all of the yards.  my neighbor's motion activated yard lights went on and all of the dogs in the neighborhood went crazy - i couldn't believe that people didn't come outside to check to see what all the noise was about!  i've also seen multiple white lights high up in the sky that dart around at sharp angles and move very fast, then just stop and look like stars in the sky.  have also seen some strange activities by the military and possibly some alien beings in the woods."
content.summary: Large object with arm followed by military aircraft in area.

content.detailedDescription:
While delivering newspapers on cr 274 southwest of altha fl., i stopped at a paper tube near the intersection of cr 274 an hannah tower rd..This location is on top of a hill overlooking the chipola river basin to the southwest.As i looked ahead to the southwest i saw what at first appeared to be stadium lights sitting motionless just above the tree line near the intersection of cr 274 and sr 73. the lights were amber in color and consisted of four separate banks containing eight lights each.I had been at this location every early morning for the previous four years and had never witnessed this before. from my vantage point on top of the hill i could clearly see the security lights at the several homes between my location and the point of interest.I know this area very well, delivering papers as well as visiting the area countless times over the past fourty-odd years. the lights on the object were very large and covered a horizontal distance of several hundred feet, estimated in relation to the the other known area features, (home security lights, tree line). i watched this object for approximately 15 mins. and decided to drive toward it, (sw on cr 274), down into the river basin, accross the chipola river at willis bridge in an attempt to get closer to the object. 
           as i arrived at the intersection cr 274 and sr73, (appox.5 min.) i stopped and got out of the truck. i looked intently in every direction but i was unable to locate the object.
content.summary: While delivering newspapers i watched amber colored, stadium size lights  sit  motionless just above the tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving along the beach at night and i saw over the ocean what i thought at first was a helicopter, but it made no noise and hovered a couple hundred feet off the water. i saw two lights on the craft. the front had a white light, the rear had a flashing red light. the lights seemed to be twisting around each other as it flew south. 

i got out of my car and ran to the beach and watched as it continued toward palos verdes. it became very small, very quickly and changed to a golden amber color. 

i know it could have been a military aircraft, but it just acted so strangely...
content.summary: Ufo seen over the ocean, close to shore...

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the seventh grade and two brothers who were my friends were going with me to the grade school to board a bus for a basket ball game.  we were no more than 100 feet from their house when the area around us was lit up.  we looked up and saw hovering over us a light without sound, shaped like an egg. this thing was a brilliant light and since i was interested in space, i was pretty well acquainted with what we had in terms of airplanes and rockets, and i knew this was not anything that existed on earth; it must have been an alien craft. i and the eldest of the two brothers attempted to get the younger one to go back to the house and get a camera but he was as fascinated by this sight as were we and he refused to go.  so we began shouting for their mother and as she came out on the front porch, the thing shrank rapidly in size which i took to mean it was moving upward and then it took a right angle turn toward the east without any apparent change in velocity. it moved onto the eastern horizon and suddenly began rolling end over end toward the south.

after describing what we saw to their mother we went on to the grade school, not more than two blocks away.  when we got there we told the other kids waiting for the bus our story and they began to laugh at us. i looked around the sky and the thing was now on the western horizon and still rolling end over end.  at that point, the other kids stopped laughing.
content.summary: It hovered over me and my 2 friends and then shot up and took a right turn.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back garden, when i noticed a oval shaped object flying towards me. i couldn't hear any noise so i wondered at first if it was a large bird. so i waited as it came towards me to see what wings it had, but no wings appeared, it stayed a oval shaped. then as it came nearly overhead i saw it was a disk shape, it looked to me like a classic flying saucer.

i couldn't believe what i was seeing, and i got a bit confused.  it continued to pass over and disappeared behind the roof of my house, (two story building), so i went around the side of my house to see it continue on its way, by this time, with the angle i was seeing it, it was back to looking like a oval shape once again. it then disappeared behind the roofs of other houses.

as i said the object at no time made any noise. it certainly wasn't a aircraft or bird as it didn't have any wings. it was very hard to judge how high it was or how big it was. i don't know if it was small object flying at a low height and slow speed, or a large object flying very high at a fast speed. or somewhere in between these two possibilities.  

what got to me is that it was broad daylight. it was flying over the town and it didn't seem to care if anyone saw it. i have no idea if anyone else saw the same object. i personally have kept quiet about it and even haven't told my wife, in case people will think i am mad or stupid.
content.summary: Oval at first then became a flying saucer shape.

content.detailedDescription:
The following happened during the fall/winter of 1973 or early spring 1974.  i lived in a two story rooming house a few blocks directly west of the university of texas campus at austin, texas.

one evening, i went to the back door of the second floor, and looked out the door's window.  i saw some lights moving very slowly westward.  very slow.  maybe 15mph.  and very low in altitude.  i stepped out on the second story stair landing to get a better view.  the lights were of the ordinary primary colors (two or three); and from my viewpoint, appeared to extend around the circumference of a craft.  circular craft, with a diameter of possibly 20-30'.

immediately, i heard the roar of a helicopter coming from the east.  it flew overhead of me, with its' spotlight on, traveling directly towards the ufo craft.  the helicopter passed to the right of the ufo, and zoomed on westward.  after that very close call, i began to see a flashing white light on the top/dome of the ufo craft.  the ufo was getting in the distance from me; and going over terrain that was descending to a creek valley with a busy boulevard; perhaps a descent in elevation is why i started seeing the flashing light.  the sighting was approximately ten minutes.  the sky was clear and starry, with plenty of air traffic that evening.  planes and helicopters flying.

i later mentioned this ufo sighting to someone; and was told someone else had seen a ufo/flying saucer out at one of the lakes just west of austin, a week or so before.

a few days after my sighting; i saw a cartoon on the editorial page of the daily texan (the univ. of texas student newspaper); with the starship enterprise beaming a ray on the u.T. tower (directly east of my residence).  i thought perhaps someone else had seen the ufo craft also.

i kept thinking incessantly about the beings in the ufo craft.  i knew they were of highly advance intelligence, and from somewhere far away; and what did they look like?

aboout four/five evening later (after my sighting), i had just finished reading some spiritual material; and felt pleasantly uplifted.  the lights were brightly on in my room.  it was late evening.  there was a big flash of light; and there was this creature before me in the air; head and "shoulders" view.  my body jerked and i gasped.  the creature was calmly and intently looking direct into my eyes.  i could only stare back.

the creature appeared to have tawny color hair/fur (like a bear or lion); and a very large build; maybe 7-8' tall.  i did not see below its' "shoulders."

the creature had two pointed ears, somewhat catlike, but seated higher on top of head.  it had two eyes, each positioned where normal human eyes are on a face.  the eyes slanted upward and outwards.  somewhat like a lion's.  the eyes had the look of high intelligence in the gaze.  there was no nose, no snout, no obvious openings in that area of the face.  it looked flat.  what was also very different; there was a substantial black/dark area (perhaps an opening for a mouth) that came down one upper side of the face; down around what would be our chin; then up what would be the other side of our face.  kind of a u shaped face.  the head with the dark "mouthlike folds" seem to sit on what appeared to be shoulders.  i did not see a neck.

this happened within a few seconds; if that long.  then just like a light switch had been turned off; it was gone.  instantaneous.  no fade out.

afterwards, i wrote out the sighting of the ufo craft; and drew a primitive sketch of the creature that appeared before my eyes; amd mailed it to the head of mufon in austin at the time; but i never heard back that it had been received.
content.summary: Slow moving/low in altitude ufo flying saucer during 1970's, austin, tx; and description of subsequent appearance of being before my eyes.
